name: Bolt'N'Punch
description:
Food for Thought strives to deliver the best food products to the common people, but when its robot workers turn against Lyft, the last human in the factory, she has to step up and punch some steel. Uncover the truth behind this attack, find your boss for answers, and put an end to this with style and power.


Unleash powerful blows to enemies, use them as a weapon and utilize the environment to your advantage.


Delve deep inside Food for Thought's factory and unravel the dark secrets that have been hidden for many years.


Encounter a variety of enemies that can punch, shoot or block your attacks. Finish them off in style with a devastating blow.
